sn17.4:1.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dighalomika elaka kantakagahanam paviseyya.
sn17.4:1.4: Sa tatra tatra sajjeyya, tatra tatra gayheyya, tatra tatra bajjheyya, tatra tatra anayabyasanam apajjeyya.
sn17.4:1.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu labhasakkarasilokena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati.
sn17.4:1.6: So tatra tatra sajjati, tatra tatra gayhati, tatra tatra bajjhati, tatra tatra anayabyasanam apajjati.
